mapper.select: SELECT l.LEND_ID AS lendId, l.BOOK_ID AS bookId, b.ISBN13 AS isbn13, bi.BOOK_TITLE AS bookTitle, bi.AUTHORS AS authors, bi.ALADIN_IMAGE_BIG AS coverImg, l.LEND_DATE AS lendDate, l.RETURN_DUE_DATE AS returnDueDate, l.RETURN_DONE_AT AS returnDoneAt, l.EXTEND_CNT AS extendCnt, CASE WHEN l.RETURN_DONE_AT IS NULL AND l.RETURN_DUE_DATE < NOW() THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS overDue FROM LENDS l JOIN BOOKS b ON l.BOOK_ID = b.BOOK_ID JOIN BOOK_ISBN bi ON b.ISBN13 = bi.ISBN13 WHERE l.USER_ID = #{userId} AND l.RETURN_DONE_AT IS NULL ORDER BY l.LEND_DATE DESC

SELECT l.LEND_ID AS lendId, l.BOOK_ID AS bookId, b.ISBN13 AS isbn13, bi.BOOK_TITLE AS bookTitle, bi.AUTHORS AS authors, bi.ALADIN_IMAGE_BIG AS coverImg, l.LEND_DATE AS lendDate, l.RETURN_DUE_DATE AS returnDueDate, l.RETURN_DONE_AT AS returnDoneAt, l.EXTEND_CNT AS extendCnt, 'Y' AS overDue FROM LENDS l JOIN BOOKS b ON l.BOOK_ID = b.BOOK_ID JOIN BOOK_ISBN bi ON b.ISBN13 = bi.ISBN13 WHERE l.USER_ID = #{userId} AND l.RETURN_DONE_AT IS NULL AND l.RETURN_DUE_DATE < NOW() ORDER BY l.RETURN_DUE_DATE ASC
SELECT l.LEND_ID AS lendId, l.RETURN_DUE_DATE AS returnDueDate FROM LENDS l WHERE l.USER_ID = #{userId} AND l.RETURN_DONE_AT IS NULL ORDER BY l.RETURN_DUE_DATE ASC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE LENDS SET RETURN_DONE_AT = NOW() WHERE LEND_ID = #{lendId} AND RETURN_DONE_AT IS NULL

UPDATE LENDS SET RETURN_DUE_DATE = DATE_ADD(RETURN_DUE_DATE, INTERVAL 7 DAY), EXTEND_CNT = 1 WHERE LEND_ID = #{lendId} AND RETURN_DONE_AT IS NULL AND EXTEND_CNT = 0 -- AND RETURN_DUE_DATE >= NOW() -- (선택) 연체중 연장 금지

SELECT b.ISBN13 AS isbn13, i.BOOK_TITLE AS bookTitle, i.AUTHORS AS authors, COALESCE(i.ALADIN_IMAGE_BIG, i.NAVER_IMAGE) AS coverImg, b.BOOKMARK_YN AS bookmarkYn, b.CREATED_AT AS createdAt, b.UPDATED_AT AS updatedAt FROM BOOKMARK b JOIN BOOK_ISBN i ON b.ISBN13 = i.ISBN13 WHERE b.USER_ID = #{userId} AND b.BOOKMARK_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY b.CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKMARK (ISBN13, USER_ID, BOOKMARK_YN, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{isbn13}, #{userId}, 'Y', NOW())
